title: Sans serifs, tight font. The tail of the 'Q' is represented by a square
content:
Hi there,  
Could someone please help me i.d. this font?  
The picture shows it in upper case. It's a tight font, sans serif and the tail of the 'Q' is a little square at the bottom, centre of the letter.  
Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131745im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2013-09-12%2018_6590.50.16.jpg)
